entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 30.
